resources.string:
Hey, curious man!

Today you found something cool, I promise.

You'll discover how to cook up delicious fried meat dumplings!

 Ingredients:

 * 300g meat dumplings
 * Spices of your choice (black pepper is essential)
 * Cooking oil (sunflower seed, olive, or another variety)
 * Frying pan


 Instructions:

 * Place the pan on the stovetop and add some oil. Let it heat up while you prepare the sauce.
 * Whip up your "special sauce": Mix and match pepper, salt, herbs, and any other desired ingredients with a drizzle of oil.
 * Once the oil is hot, carefully add the dumplings to the pan. Let them cook for 3 minutes.
 * Pour the "special sauce" evenly over the dumplings, gently stirring them to coat.
 * Cook for an additional 5-10 minutes, depending on the size and thickness of your dumplings. Smaller dumplings and thinner dough will cook faster.
 * Turn off the heat and your delicious dumplings are ready to serve!
